Morning Coffee Run :: Tweed jacket & Watermark plaid

by wendy

Tweet

Hi everyone! Just a quick hello and I hope you’re having a wonderful weekend so far!

Thank you so much for reading!

:: Outfit ::

Top :: Carven jacket (old), blouse thanks to Marissa Webb!
Bottom :: Stylestalker
Shoes :: Bottega Veneta

Published: September 7, 2013
